name: EXPERIMENTAL FILM: "Penelope's Waiting"
description:
[SOUND ON]

The SECOND "work-in-progress" video sketch for an 
upcoming large scale collaboration with
David Feltner -- the creator of 100 Goobers
on OPEN SEAS.
https://opensea.io/collection/100-goobers
Follow DAVID 
@feltnerlii on TWITTER.

Grab this early piece before our large scale collab is done.

Music and Art "Veil of SLEEP" by HPLoveBux
New Digital Video effects by David Feltner and HPL

notes - this scene represents Penelope waiting as days pass years pass with no word from her husband . . .
